column4: i have a laptop here and so far all attempts to install ubuntu on it have failed. The live cd crashes to busybox, while the alternate cd can't find a hard disk on it for some reason. all-generic-ide has no effect.
what laptop u using? im having similar problems
Can someone goddam help me plz
Do u know how to add modules like http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=2317401&highlight=feisty+uuid
1. Boot from an Edgy Live CD
when a floodbot mutes you we cannot hear you.
